body_html:
By the way, the GPU utilization was kind of underwhelming. I was expecting better load balancing with MPI. Maybe it just has to do with specific "glow" examples. On Fri, Sep 28, 2018 at 12:03 PM pensive introvert < pensive.introvert@gmail.com> wrote:
…
I tested TF with MPI using some examples from the openAI "glow" repo. On Fri, Sep 28, 2018 at 12:01 PM pensive introvert < ***@***.***> wrote: > I did it before the merge, so it is probably not needed now. One might > need to either do "bazel clean" or just delete the folder and clone the > repo again. I installed MPI under /usr/local and passed that to > "./configure". > > > On Fri, Sep 28, 2018 at 11:32 AM Yong Tang ***@***.***> > wrote: > >> @phalexo <https://github.com/phalexo> I thought the ToString() issue >> has been fixed in #22084 >> <#22084> and has been >> merged. But let me double check again. >> >> — >> You are receiving this because you were mentioned. >> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub >> <#22376 (comment)>, >> or mute the thread >> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AEY95c2ZnBlsAetravCHolLDxOgupL3uks5ufkEkgaJpZM4WvvEc> >> . >> >
body_text:
By the way, the GPU utilization was kind of underwhelming. I was expecting
better load balancing with MPI. Maybe it just has to do with specific
"glow" examples.


On Fri, Sep 28, 2018 at 12:03 PM pensive introvert <
pensive.introvert@gmail.com> wrote:
…
 I tested TF with MPI using some examples from the openAI "glow" repo.


 On Fri, Sep 28, 2018 at 12:01 PM pensive introvert <
 ***@***.***> wrote:

> I did it before the merge, so it is probably not needed now. One might
> need to either do "bazel clean" or just delete the folder and clone the
> repo again. I installed MPI under /usr/local and passed that to
> "./configure".
>
>
> On Fri, Sep 28, 2018 at 11:32 AM Yong Tang ***@***.***>
> wrote:
>
>> @phalexo <https://github.com/phalexo> I thought the ToString() issue
>> has been fixed in #22084
>> <#22084> and has been
>> merged. But let me double check again.
>>
>> —
>> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
>> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
>> <#22376 (comment)>,
>> or mute the thread
>> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AEY95c2ZnBlsAetravCHolLDxOgupL3uks5ufkEkgaJpZM4WvvEc>
>> .
>>
>
body:
By the way, the GPU utilization was kind of underwhelming. I was expecting
better load balancing with MPI. Maybe it just has to do with specific
"glow" examples.


On Fri, Sep 28, 2018 at 12:03 PM pensive introvert <
pensive.introvert@gmail.com> wrote:

> I tested TF with MPI using some examples from the openAI "glow" repo.
>
>
> On Fri, Sep 28, 2018 at 12:01 PM pensive introvert <
> pensive.introvert@gmail.com> wrote:
>
>> I did it before the merge, so it is probably not needed now. One might
>> need to either do "bazel clean" or just delete the folder and clone the
>> repo again. I installed MPI under /usr/local and passed that to
>> "./configure".
>>
>>
